publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1852.1 Jack McConnell: Pingat Jasa Malaysia - Service to Malaysia Medalâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1852) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "for the presentation" to "honoured" and insert "and Motherwell on Thursday 8 May 2008 for the presentation of the Pingat Jasa Malaysia (PJM) medal by the Government of Malaysia; congratulates the 300 former service personnel honoured at each event"
